content.rendered:
You can submit your Bitcoin or Cryptocurrency related Press Release for distribution which you have written and we will post it on the site along with links back to your site, social media profiles and any other links within it. It will be posted within 24 hours and promoted on our Twitter and Facebook accounts which have thousands of combined followers.

Your PR will also appear on our partner sites – Binance, Coinmarketcap, Coingecko, Dow Jones Factiva & More.

The release is displayed on the homepage will remain in our archives permanently.

We receive over half million visitors per month so your Press Release will be seen by a wide audience which is interested in Cryptocurrencies and Blockchain technology.

We have run hundreds of Press Releases on the site and previous advertisers have seen great results from partnering with Blockonomi, one of the most widely-read and prestigious blockchain publications online.

Simply use the form below to submit your Press Release and we will format it and create the images for it, ensuring it meets our high standards for publication.

We accept Press Release Submissions from the following types of companies: Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency, Blockchain, Fintech, ICO, Finance and Technology.

Cost to Submit a Press Release is $299.

Bulk discounts as follows:

  • x1 PR: $299
  • x3 PR: $629

We also offer complete in-depth reviews of your company for $699 with extra promotion, please see our advertising page for more details.

Please use the following form to submit your Press Release, We will reply the same day with our payment details. We can accept payment in Cryptocurrency or you are also able to pay via PayPal or Credit card.
